statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerRiskProfile WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT customer_id, risk_score FROM CustomerRiskProfile ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT risk_level, risk_description FROM CustomerRiskProfile WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM CustomerRiskProfile WHERE risk_score BETWEEN 50 AND 75;
SELECT customer_id, risk_level FROM CustomerRiskProfile WHERE risk_level LIKE 'M%';
SELECT customer_id, risk_level FROM CustomerRiskProfile WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT risk_score, risk_description FROM CustomerRiskProfile WHERE risk_score > 80 ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerRiskProfile WHERE risk_description LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT customer_id, risk_level, risk_score, risk_description FROM CustomerRiskProfile WHERE risk_level = 'Medium' OR risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, risk_score FROM CustomerRiskProfile WHERE customer_id < 100 AND risk_score BETWEEN 60 AND 80;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments;
SELECT customer_name, risk_profile FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_category = 'High';
SELECT id, strategy_name FROM marketing_strategies ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Email Campaign';
SELECT customer_name, risk_profile, segment_category FROM customer_segments WHERE risk_profile = 'Low' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT id, customer_name, risk_profile, segment_category FROM customer_segments WHERE risk_profile = 'LowRisk';
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_category = 'Premium' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT segment_id, strategy_name, description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE description LIKE '%target audience%';
SELECT customer_name, risk_profile, segment_category FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_category = 'Standard' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE risk_profile='High'
SELECT segment_name FROM segments
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id=2
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, segment_name FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id=customer_segments.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, risk_profile FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM segments ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_name, s.segment_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_segments cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id JOIN segments s ON cs.segment_id = s.segment_id;
SELECT segment_id, COUNT(customer_id) AS customer_count FROM customer_segments GROUP BY segment_id HAVING COUNT(customer_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, risk_profile FROM customers WHERE risk_profile='high';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM high_risk_customers WHERE risk_score > 80 ORDER BY risk_score ASC;
SELECT name, email, risk_profile FROM customers WHERE risk_profile!='medium' AND risk_profile!='high';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT email, risk_profile FROM customers WHERE risk_profile = 'medium';
SELECT c.name, hr.risk_score FROM customers c JOIN high_risk_customers hr ON c.id = hr.customer_id;
SELECT c.name, lc.risk_score FROM customers c JOIN low_risk_customers lc ON c.id = lc.customer_id WHERE lc.risk_score > 50;
SELECT c.name, mc.risk_score FROM customers c JOIN medium_risk_customers mc ON c.id = mc.customer_id ORDER BY mc.risk_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, risk_profile FROM customers WHERE risk_profile='low';
SELECT customer_id, classification FROM high_risk_customers ORDER BY classification DESC;
SELECT customer_id, strategy_name FROM high_risk_customers INNER JOIN marketing_strategies ON high_risk_customers.customer_id = marketing_strategies.strategy_id;
SELECT customer_name, classification, description FROM customers LEFT JOIN marketing_strategies ON customers.customer_id = marketing_strategies.strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contact_info FROM customers WHERE risk_profile = 'high';
SELECT customer_name, risk_profile FROM customers WHERE risk_profile LIKE '%risk';
SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_name, m.strategy_name FROM customers c JOIN marketing_strategies m ON c.customer_id = m.strategy_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, r.classification FROM customers c JOIN high_risk_customers r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id WHERE r.risk_factor > 5;
